titles.title: A bill to authorize reduced postage rates for certain mail matter sent to Members of Congress.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Governmental Affairs.
Referred to Subcommittee on Federal Services, Post Office.

committee.subcommittee: Federal Services, Post Office, and Civil Service
committee.name: Senate Governmental Affairs

bill.summary: 1/6/1987--Introduced. Authorizes individuals to use a special one cent stamp to send any piece of mail not exceeding four ounces in weight to their Senators and Representatives in Congress.
